titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an excise tax exemption for transportation on certain ferries.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5925-5926)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the excise tax on transportation of passengers by water a ferry voyage of less than 12 hours between a port in the United States and a port outside the United States.
